thread.title: Earls of Leicester win 4 at Bluegrass Awards

title: Earls of Leicester win 4 at Bluegrass Awards
text:
> North Carolina Earls of Leicester win 4 at Bluegrass Awards In this Sept. 2, 2015 photo, Steve Martin poses for a portrait in New York to promote his new album "So Familiar," with Edie Brickell. (Photo by Victoria Will/Invision/AP) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team! Upload your videos and photos and share with the entire WHIO-TV community!
